Created an attachment (id=64447)
Screen with error.

This might / probably is something else.

Was not able to view any web RepositoryDescriptor that was outside the firewall.  Websites that are inside the firewall were able to be displayed.

It appears that the proxy is not being invoked.  On the Win32 platform, a diaglog appears requesting proxy uid/pwd validation.  This does not happen for Linux.
Are you able to setup browser? Try type "about:config". If you set "network.proxy.autoconfig_url" with proxy configuration URL and "network.proxy.type=2". I don't know any other way of setting this.

I was looking for a while on this. Nothing obvious. I suppose there is something strange in my Linux installation. It started to happen since Europa M6 and in this release there were some changes in browser. Maybe M7 will fix it ...
